summary: Provides a reference implementation for training an unconditional DDPM diffusion model on image datasets, including data loading, preprocessing, model and scheduler configuration, optimizer and EMA handling, periodic evaluation, checkpoint management, and optional logging or hub upload. Accompanied by automated tests that verify successful training completion and checkpoint retention policies.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly set up and run unconditional image generation training pipelines, reproduce results, fineâ€‘tune models on custom data, and share trained checkpoints via the Hugging Face Hub, thereby accelerating product development and research in generative AI.
